content: You can only create 3 custom themes. To create a new one, you must delete one of the previous themes.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip that informs users they have reached their limit of custom themes and provides instructions on how to create a new one. The tooltip appears in an appearance settings page, specifically related to portal settings, and helps users understand the restrictions on creating custom themes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'ŸÇŸàÿßŸÑÿ®' (qalab) is a more general term for 'molds' or 'patterns'. While technically acceptable, 'ÿ™ÿµÿßŸÖŸäŸÖ' (tasameem) would be a more accurate and natural translation for 'themes' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸÉ ŸÅŸÇÿ∑ ÿ•ŸÜÿ¥ÿßÿ° 3 ÿ™ÿµÿßŸÖŸäŸÖ ŸÖÿÆÿµÿµÿ©. ŸÑÿ•ŸÜÿ¥ÿßÿ° Ÿàÿßÿ≠ÿØÿ© ÿ¨ÿØŸäÿØÿ© ÿå Ÿäÿ¨ÿ® ÿπŸÑŸäŸÉ ÿ≠ÿ∞ŸÅ ÿ£ÿ≠ÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿµÿßŸÖŸäŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿßÿ®ŸÇÿ©.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Chcete-li vytvo≈ôit nov√©' is a bit awkward. A more natural translation of 'To create a new one' would be 'Pro vytvo≈ôen√≠ nov√©ho'.

The word 'themes' (’©’•’¥’°) is used twice. The first instance refers to custom themes, while the second refers to previous themes. While technically correct, it's slightly clunky. Consider rephrasing for better flow. The word 'themes' could be translated as '’§’´’¶’°’µ’∂’°’µ’´’∂ ’©’•’¥’°’∂’•÷Ä' in the first instance to specifically indicate custom themes.
While not strictly incorrect, consider adding a colon after '‘¥’∏÷Ç÷Ñ ’Ø’°÷Ä’∏’≤ ’•÷Ñ ’Ω’ø’•’≤’Æ’•’¨ ’¥’´’°’µ’∂ 3 ’∞’°’ø’∏÷Ç’Ø ’©’•’¥’°:' to match the formatting of the English version.

The term 'custom themes' is translated literally as '‡∫Æ‡∫π‡∫ö‡ªÅ‡∫ö‡∫ö custom'. While understandable, a more natural Lao phrasing would be '‡∫Æ‡∫π‡∫ö‡ªÅ‡∫ö‡∫ö‡∫ó‡∫µ‡ªà‡∫Å‡∫≥‡∫°‡ªâ‡∫≤‡∫á' or '‡ªÅ‡∫ö‡∫ö‡∫¢‡ªà‡∫≤‡∫á‡∫ó‡∫µ‡ªà‡∫ú‡∫π‡ªâ‡ªÉ‡∫ä‡ªâ‡∫™‡ªâ‡∫≤‡∫á'.
The word '‡∫≠‡∫±‡∫ô‡ªÉ‡∫´‡∫°‡ªà' is a bit awkward. It's better to use a more descriptive phrase.
The word '‡ªÅ‡∫ö‡∫ö‡∫¢‡ªà‡∫≤‡∫á‡ªÉ‡ªù‡ªà' might benefit from reviewing if the best phrasing is desired. While correct, it's slightly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review alternative phrasing for '‡ªÅ‡∫ö‡∫ö‡∫¢‡ªà‡∫≤‡∫á‡ªÉ‡ªù‡ªà' to maintain a more natural tone (e.g., ‡∫Æ‡∫π‡∫ö‡ªÅ‡∫ö‡∫ö‡ªÉ‡ªù‡ªà).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You can only create 3 custom themes' is not perfectly captured by 'S√≥ se podem criar 3 temas personalizados.'. While the meaning is conveyed, the original phrasing emphasizes a limitation. A more accurate translation would better reflect that restriction. 'Apenas pode criar 3 temas personalizados' or 'Pode criar apenas 3 temas personalizados' are better alternatives.
The number '3' is represented as 'ëá£ (3)'. This looks awkward and disrupts the flow. It's better to integrate it into the Sinhala sentence naturally.

The word 'delete' is rendered as '‡∂∏‡∂ö‡∑è ‡∂Ø‡∑ê‡∂∏‡∑í‡∂∫ ‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂∫'. While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly phrasing might be preferable. '‡∂â‡∂ö‡∑ä‡∂∏‡∑É‡∑è ‡∂ú‡∂≠ ‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂∫' or '‡∂¥‡∑è‡∑É‡∂Ø‡∂Ω ‡∂∫‡∑î‡∂≠‡∑î‡∂∫' could be considered.

The phrase "You can only create 3 custom themes" is somewhat stiffly translated. A more natural Slovenian phrasing would be better. 'Ustvarite lahko samo 3 teme po meri' is technically correct, but lacks the flow of the English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lahko ustvarite najveƒç 3 teme po meri.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'prej≈°njih tem' (previous themes) is grammatically correct but could be improved for clarity. While 'prej≈°njih' implies the theme existed before, it's not as direct as implying you have to delete *an* existing theme.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ƒåe ≈æelite ustvariti novo, morate izbrisati eno od ≈æe obstojeƒçih tem.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word '–ø—Ä–∏–ª–∞–≥–æ—í–µ–Ω–µ' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be '–∫–æ—Ä–∏—Å–Ω–∏—á–∫–µ'.
The word 'kreitrali' is a misspelling. It should be 'kreirati'.
